auth.resetPasswordInstructions: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetSent: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
auth.passwordResetNote: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password. If you don't receive an email within a few minutes, check your spam folder.
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.almostThere: Almost there! Review your information and complete registration.
auth.termsAgreement: By clicking "Complete Registration", you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back! Please enter your credentials below.

hero.title: Create Impressive Business Plans in Minutes
hero.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform helps entrepreneurs, consultants, and business owners craft professional business plans with ease.

features.title: Powerful Features to Transform Your Business
features.subtitle: Our comprehensive platform offers everything you need to create a winning business plan

howItWorks.title: How Sqordia Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Create your business plan in four simple steps

step1.title: Choose a Template
step1.description: Select from industry-specific templates designed by business experts to match your needs.

step2.title: Answer Simple Questions
step2.description: Our guided questionnaire helps you articulate your business vision clearly and comprehensively.

step3.title: Generate with AI
step3.description: Our powerful AI creates professional content for each section based on your responses.

step4.title: Customize & Export
step4.description: Edit your plan as needed, then export in multiple formats to share with stakeholders.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied entrepreneurs who have transformed their business planning process

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

cta.title: Ready to Create Your Business Plan?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of entrepreneurs who have successfully launched and grown their businesses with Sqordia.
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required to get started

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.startFromScratch: Start from scratch or use a template

businessPlan.title: Business Plan Editor
businessPlan.aiDialogDesc: Let our AI assistant generate content for the section of your business plan. The AI will use information from your questionnaire responses to create tailored content.
businessPlan.aiDialogReview: You can review and edit the AI-generated content before saving it.
businessPlan.aiDialogWarning: AI-generated content is a starting point. Always review and customize to ensure accuracy and alignment with your business vision.
businessPlan.exportDialogDesc: Choose a format to export your business plan.
businessPlan.shareDialogDesc: Share your business plan with team members, investors, or advisors.

questionnaire.title: Business Plan Questionnaire
questionnaire.templateDesc: Select a template that best fits your business type to get started. You can customize it later.
questionnaire.exitDesc: Your progress has been saved automatically. You can return to continue this questionnaire at any time.

basics.title: Business Basics
basics.description: Let's start with the fundamentals of your business

product.title: Products & Services
product.description: Tell us about what your business offers to customers

market.title: Market Analysis
market.description: Understand your market, customers, and competition

strategy.title: Business Strategy
strategy.description: Define your goals and how you plan to achieve them

financials.title: Financial Projections
financials.description: Understand the financial aspects of your business

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.sessionTimeoutDesc: You will be automatically logged out after this period of inactivity
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
profile.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone, and all your data will be permanently removed.
profile.typeToConfirm: To confirm, please type DELETE below:

subscription.title: Subscription Management
subscription.subtitle: Manage your subscription plan and billing information

upgradeDialog.title: Upgrade Subscription
upgradeDialog.description: You're about to upgrade to the {plan} plan. This will give you access to additional features and benefits.
upgradeDialog.billingDesc: You will be billed immediately and then on a {period}ly basis.

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Subscription
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to premium features at the end of your current billing period.
cancelDialog.warning: Any business plans you've created will remain accessible, but you won't be able to use premium features after cancellation.

billing.billingHistoryDesc: Your billing history will appear here once you subscribe to a paid plan.

payment.noPaymentMethodsDesc: You haven't added any payment methods yet.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Manage users, view statistics, and monitor platform activity

users.name: Name
users.deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone, and all of the user's data will be permanently removed.

security.strong: Strong (8+ chars with numbers, symbols, mixed case)
